title: PBE acceptance: Hey RIOT I HAVE A QUESTION/ISSUE
body:
Hey RIOT,

I received an email regarding acceptance to PBE but when I click the Create PBE account button it redirects me to the PBE page on this website. Then when I hit check my status or apply not it redirects me back to the same page I was just on... Not sure if this is a bug or not but I wanted to ask.

Thanks for the replies.

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times. It can usually be resolved with a few quick steps. First, [clear your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or use another browser that you don't normally use. Next, log into your account from [the NA front page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) Next, you can visit the [PBE Signup page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) and you should be good to go.

Let me know if this helped.
Thanks a lot, shortly after I posted the issue was resolved!
